statements: SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, bytes_transferred FROM network_traffic_data WHERE port = 80
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'TCP'
SELECT destination_ip, bytes_transferred FROM network_traffic_data WHERE bytes_transferred > 1000 ORDER BY bytes_transferred DESC
SELECT DISTINCT protocol FROM network_traffic_data
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, bytes_transferred FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'TCP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE bytes_transferred > 10000 ORDER BY bytes_transferred ASC, timestamp DESC
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, port, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY port ASC
SELECT DISTINCT source_ip, destination_ip, port FROM network_traffic_data WHERE destination_ip LIKE '%.com' ORDER BY source_ip DESC
SELECT AVG(bytes_transferred) AS avg_bytes, MIN(bytes_transferred) AS min_bytes, MAX(bytes_transferred) AS max_bytes FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'UDP'
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, traffic_amount FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, traffic_type, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE traffic_amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activity WHERE event_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, event_type, description FROM suspicious_activity WHERE detection_method LIKE '%signature%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE traffic_type = 'DDoS' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, event_type FROM suspicious_activity WHERE event_type = 'Malware' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT destination_ip, traffic_amount FROM network_traffic_data WHERE destination_ip LIKE '192.168.%' ORDER BY traffic_amount DESC LIMIT 15
SELECT id, description, detection_method FROM suspicious_activity WHERE description LIKE '%attack%' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 8
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data LIMIT 10
SELECT id, source_ip, timestamp FROM suspicious_activity_logs WHERE action_taken = 'blocked'
SELECT destination_ip, source_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT threat_type, source_ip, destination_ip FROM cyber_threats WHERE threat_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'HTTP'
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM suspicious_activity_logs GROUP BY source_ip HAVING total_count > 5 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, threat_type FROM cyber_threats WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT DISTINCT source_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'TCP' OR protocol = 'UDP';
SELECT * FROM Network_Traffic_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT source_ip, data_size FROM Network_Traffic_Data WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT destination_ip, timestamp FROM Network_Traffic_Data WHERE data_size > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, activity_description, severity_level FROM Suspicious_Activity_Logs WHERE severity_level = 10;
SELECT * FROM Cyber_Threat_Events WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Network_Traffic_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC, data_size ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM Network_Traffic_Data WHERE threat_level > 3 AND data_size > 10000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM Network_Traffic_Data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND data_size BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY data_size DESC
SELECT * FROM Suspicious_Activity_Logs WHERE severity_level = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, event_type, description, timestamp FROM Cyber_Threat_Events WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM network_devices ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' AND data_size > 1000;
SELECT id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT threat_name, description FROM cyber_threats WHERE threat_level = 'high';
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, mac_address FROM network_devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS traffic_count FROM network_traffic GROUP BY source_ip HAVING COUNT(*) > 100;
SELECT threat_name, threat_level, description FROM cyber_threats WHERE threat_level = 'high' ORDER BY threat_name ASC;
